pull.title: doc: use recommended shebang approach in documentation code block
pull.body: Documentation update to use recommended shebang approach mentioned in the [developer notes](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md#shebang)

events.body: Have you searched for similar places were this change could be applied?

@promag Yea, the only other place I believe that this change could be applied is: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/test/lint/lint-shell.sh#L54

I'll add that change as well

events.message: use preferred shebang approach for documentation

events.body: ACK 6094222de7820d235e6e8c66e589aa71db08c077, I have reviewed the code, and it looks OK, I agree it can be merged.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ do
     echo
     echo "$descriptor"
     # Use #!/bin/bash as gitian-builder/bin/gbuild does to complete a script.
comments.body: pleas update the comment as well

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ do
     echo
     echo "$descriptor"
     # Use #!/bin/bash as gitian-builder/bin/gbuild does to complete a script.

@@ -50,8 +50,8 @@ for descriptor in $(git ls-files -- 'contrib/gitian-descriptors/*.yml')
 do
     echo
     echo "$descriptor"
-    # Use #!/bin/bash as gitian-builder/bin/gbuild does to complete a script.
-    SCRIPT=$'#!/bin/bash\n'$(yq -r .script "$descriptor")
+    # Use #!/usr/bin/env bash to complete script with preferred shebang approach.
+    SCRIPT=$'#!/usr/bin/env bash\n'$(yq -r .script "$descriptor")
comments.body:
Please do not change these lines as it is intended to mimic the way `gitian-builder/bin/gbuild` does: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17361#discussion_r342189958

... and the comment says so ;)

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ do
     echo
     echo "$descriptor"
     # Use #!/bin/bash as gitian-builder/bin/gbuild does to complete a script.

@@ -50,8 +50,8 @@ for descriptor in $(git ls-files -- 'contrib/gitian-descriptors/*.yml')
 do
     echo
     echo "$descriptor"
-    # Use #!/bin/bash as gitian-builder/bin/gbuild does to complete a script.
-    SCRIPT=$'#!/bin/bash\n'$(yq -r .script "$descriptor")
+    # Use #!/usr/bin/env bash to complete script with preferred shebang approach.
+    SCRIPT=$'#!/usr/bin/env bash\n'$(yq -r .script "$descriptor")
comments.body: ah gotcha! Thank you for the clarification - will remove this change
